<tei-TEI data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="TEI" data-origatts="xmlns">

                        <tei-surname data-origname="surname">Pfeffer</tei-surname>

                    </tei-persName>

            </tei-titleStmt>
            <tei-publicationStmt data-origname="publicationStmt">
                <tei-publisher data-origname="publisher">
                    <tei-persName data-origname="persName">
                        <tei-persName data-origname="persName">
                            <tei-surname data-origname="surname">Pfeffer</tei-surname>
                            <tei-forename data-origname="forename">Niels</tei-forename>
                        </tei-persName>
                    </tei-persName>
                </tei-publisher>
                <tei-pubPlace data-origname="pubPlace">Tübingen</tei-pubPlace>
                <tei-date data-origname="date">2023</tei-date>
                <tei-availability data-origname="availability">
                    <tei-licence target="https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/" data-origname="licence" data-origatts="target">

                    </tei-licence>
                </tei-availability>
            </tei-publicationStmt>
            <tei-sourceDesc data-origname="sourceDesc">
                <tei-bibl data-origname="bibl">The Original Welte-Built Welte-Mignon Reperforming Grand Piano</tei-bibl>
                <tei-biblFull data-origname="biblFull">
                    <tei-titleStmt data-origname="titleStmt">
                        <tei-title level="m" type="main" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">
                            The Original Welte-Built Welte-Mignon Reperforming Grand Piano
                        </tei-title>
                        <tei-author data-origname="author">
                            <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">E. F. Droop & Sons</tei-orgName>
                        </tei-author>
                    </tei-titleStmt>
                    <tei-publicationStmt data-origname="publicationStmt">
                        <tei-publisher data-origname="publisher">
                            <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">The Sunday Star</tei-orgName>
                        </tei-publisher>
                        <tei-pubPlace ref="https://www.geonames.org/4140963" data-origname="pubPlace" data-origatts="ref">Washington D.C.</tei-pubPlace>
                        <tei-date type="publication" data-origname="date" data-origatts="type">1924</tei-date>
                    </tei-publicationStmt>
                    <tei-seriesStmt data-origname="seriesStmt">
                        <tei-title level="j" type="main" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">The Sunday Star</tei-title>
                        <tei-biblScope unit="issue" data-origname="biblScope" data-origatts="unit">November 23, 1924</tei-biblScope>
                        <tei-biblScope unit="pages" data-origname="biblScope" data-origatts="unit">20</tei-biblScope>
                    </tei-seriesStmt>
                </tei-biblFull>
                <tei-msDesc data-origname="msDesc">
                    <tei-msIdentifier data-origname="msIdentifier">
                        <tei-repository data-origname="repository">Library of Congress</tei-repository>
                        <tei-idno type="URLImages" data-origname="idno" data-origatts="type">https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045462/1924-11-23/ed-1/seq-20</tei-idno>
                    </tei-msIdentifier>
                </tei-msDesc>

        </tei-fileDesc>
        <tei-profileDesc data-origname="profileDesc">
            <tei-langUsage data-origname="langUsage">

    </tei-teiHeader>
    <tei-facsimile data-origname="facsimile">
        <tei-surface data-origname="surface">
            <tei-graphic url="ef-droop.png" width="786" height="1279" data-origname="graphic" data-origatts="height width url" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="293,35 293,348 750,348 750,35" id="eSc_textblock_ecd65fb1" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="296,373 296,352 57,352 57,373" id="eSc_textblock_6cbc3d51" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="729,406 700,493 680,510 635,511 680,517 697,542 695,715 629,744 689,756 692,854 590,880 587,882 264,882 260,880 164,869 150,857 147,792 76,769 73,446 39,428 36,395 40,386 707,386" id="eSc_textblock_9aa8d87e" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="587,912 726,929 731,974 709,1003 709,1019 731,1107 561,1147 481,1153 224,1147 178,1116 42,1110 36,1094 59,1022 51,965 59,912 114,910 584,910" id="eSc_textblock_634ec641" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="717,1182 731,1190 734,1232 723,1244 606,1249 56,1244 36,1235 36,1199 51,1185 472,1170" id="eSc_textblock_7218a8b1" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="35,36 35,358 300,358 300,36" id="eSc_textblock_3cda1b14" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_3cda1b14" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                    A Welte Grand.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_ecd65fb1" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-hi rendition="#right" class="right" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The Original Welte-Built
                <tei-hi rendition="#larger" class="larger" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte-Mignon
                </tei-hi>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Reperforming Grand Piano
            </tei-hi>

            <tei-p data-origname="p">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The original instrument which astonished the
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>musical world, and for which scores and scores
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of famous pianists and composers have played
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>their supreme efforts.
            </tei-p>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6cbc3d51" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>In Mahagony
                <tei-measure commodity="wm-grand" unit="dollar" quantity="2575" data-origname="measure" data-origatts="quantity unit commodity">
                    $2,575
                </tei-measure>
            </tei-hi>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_9aa8d87e" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-hi rendition="#b #i" class="b i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName data-origname="persName">Mrs. Mary Roberts Rinehart</tei-persName>––
            </tei-hi>
            
            
            <tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>our distinguished novelist and a lover of the best in
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>music, has written the foreword to the newly pub-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>lished <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon Catalog</tei-name>, which is a little classic
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>and which we will gladly send you.
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>We quote the following:
            </tei-hi>

            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-quote data-origname="quote">
                "Some ten years or so ago a friend took me into her house and showed
                me
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the first <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> I had ever heard. * * * Since then the strangeness
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>has gone away from such an experience. The marvel of yesterday is the com-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>monplace of today. But there will never be anything commonplace about hav-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ing <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118697641" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Grieg</tei-persName>
                himself sit down at your piano,
                <tei-seg ana="#atmosphere" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    in the twilight with the lamps low
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>and the fire burning
                </tei-seg>, and see the keys go down under the pressure of those
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>artistic fingers, and
                <tei-seg ana="#listening" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    listening. Just listening to him.
                </tei-seg>
                <tei-seg ana="#virtual_presence" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    Here he had lifted his
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>hands; there he had held that long-sustained note – could I not see him holding
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>it? He was sitting there playing. Here he was gentle, a little sad. Here again
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>he had roused himself into a passion; his heart swelled.
                </tei-seg> He was saying with
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>music those things which one does
                not say with words-
            </tei-quote>

            <tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>And to think
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>that
                <tei-seg ana="#home" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">
                    you can have the most distinguished pian-
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ists do this same thing in your home – with the
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name>!
                </tei-seg>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>You are cordially invited to a demonstration
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>at any time.
            </tei-hi>

            <tei-hi rendition="#smaller" class="smaller" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> Grands Priced
            </tei-hi>
            from <tei-measure commodity="wm-grand" unit="dollar" quantity="1695" data-origname="measure" data-origatts="quantity unit commodity">$ 1,695</tei-measure> Up
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_634ec641" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>And other
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Steinway</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>High-Grade
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Pianos
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Player
            Pianos-<tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Victrolas</tei-name>-Records
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Player Piano Rolls, Music, Musical Instruments

            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Guaranteed New Upright Pianos,
            <tei-hi rendition="#b" class="b" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-measure commodity="upright" unit="dollar" quantity="325" data-origname="measure" data-origatts="quantity unit commodity">
                    $325
                </tei-measure>
            </tei-hi>
            <tei-space dim="horizontal" data-origname="space" data-origatts="dim" data-empty=""/>
            Grands,
            <tei-hi rendition="#b" class="b" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-measure commodity="grand" unit="dollar" quantity="635" data-origname="measure" data-origatts="quantity unit commodity">
                    $635
                </tei-measure>
            </tei-hi>
            <tei-space dim="horizontal" data-origname="space" data-origatts="dim" data-empty=""/>
            Player Pianos,
            <tei-hi rendition="#b" class="b" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-measure commodity="player-piano" unit="dollar" quantity="559" data-origname="measure" data-origatts="quantity unit commodity">
                    $559
                </tei-measure>
            </tei-hi>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#affordability" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                Accommodating Terms of Payment.
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_7218a8b1" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">E. F. Droop & Sons Co.</tei-orgName>,
            <tei-address data-origname="address">1300 G</tei-address>
        </tei-div>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
